shot.composition: Medium Close-Up (MCU) of the entrepreneur, slightly low angle, rule of thirds, focus on the face and the phone screen.
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Slow, smooth Gimbal push-in (20cm) to emphasize focus on the app interaction.. Sequence 2 (4-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.

physical.posture: Confident, focused, slightly leaning forward over the table

facial_features.hair: Dark brown, shoulder-length, styled in a modern, professional manner
facial_features.expression: Subtle smile of satisfaction and concentration

wardrobe.jacket: Structured, minimalist blazer in deep navy blue
wardrobe.accessories: Minimalist gold hoop earrings, sleek smartwatch

scene.location: High-end, modern, minimalist coffee shop (e.g., in a financial district)

layout.width: Clean wooden table, a single, high-design ceramic coffee cup, a minimalist notebook
layout.flooring: Polished concrete or light oak wood
layout.walls: Textured white wall with a subtle, abstract art piece in the background

environment.background: Softly blurred background with other patrons working on laptops, suggesting a productive, professional environment.
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Large, soft window light (North-facing) acting as key light
lighting.quality: Soft and diffused, high contrast ratio (4:1) to create a focused, professional mood
lighting.color_temperature: 5600K (Daylight balanced), with a slight warm tint (3800K) from practical lamps in the background
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Cool blues, deep navy, and crisp whites (Fintech aesthetic), contrasted with warm wood tones and coffee.
color_grading.tone: Sharp, high-fidelity, and sophisticated. Cinematic, slightly desaturated for a modern, serious feel.

audio.ambient: Low-level, sophisticated cafe chatter (espresso machine hiss, soft clinking of cups, distant, muffled conversation)
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Crisp, distinct sound of a finger tapping the glass screen of the smartphone, subtle rustle of the blazer fabric.. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: Minimalist, ambient electronic track with a driving, confident rhythm (e.g., similar to Tycho or Moby's instrumental work). The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles. Ensure the smartphone screen is clear and legible, displaying a clean, modern UI.
visual_rules.realism: Ultra-detailed textures revealing the premium quality of the products. Consistent environmental reflections on glossy surfaces. Professional three-point lighting sculpting the shapes. Visible macro details (grains, fibers, finishes).
visual_rules.continuity: Continuity of environmental reflections on surfaces. Maintenance of cleanliness and product condition. Consistency of ambient lighting and color temperature. Smooth camera movements and transitions.
